question: Which city will host the inaugural edition of the 4th Nation Intercontinental Cup football tournament?
explanation: Mumbai Football Arena, the new hub of Indian football, will play host to the inaugural edition of the 4 nation Intercontinental Cup. Tournament will see Indian national team competing with the likes of South Africa, New Zealand & Chinese Taipei. Intercontinental Cup comes on back of Tri-nation series in Sept 2017 which was also held at the same venue with India eventually emerging champions.
